extends java.lang.Object
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    Class DansaDB
    File DansaDB.Java
    Description Handles all communication with the SQL database, this class builds the tables, populates them, modifies them, and mines them.
